typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		runtime as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> jsoninput
jsoninput derive(actors = map(actors,#item),
		availabilityDate = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		genre = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		rating = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		releaseYear = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		streamingAvailabilityDate = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		tier = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		title = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		id = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		actors,
		availabilityDate,
		genre,
		rating,
		releaseYear,
		runtime,
		streamingAvailabilityDate,
		tier,
		title,
		id,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
